talk.author: did:plc:sq5mpefzpvr2n2vhfza3enp3
talk.utter: The blame lies squarely on the shoulders of the politicians and the judges, both groups completely corrupt.

talk.author: did:plc:2qsizws3cqz2jdnn5prfs5r6
talk.utter: Honestly… the blame can be spread so thin it’s difficult to see who it stains.  It’s everyone who voted for trump. Everyone who didn’t vote at all.  People who didn’t canvas enough. People outside and inside of the country creating influence. Now who will commit doing what is morally right when our

talk.author: did:plc:sq5mpefzpvr2n2vhfza3enp3
talk.utter:
The Democrats have to also take the share of the blame. As usual, they do nothing concrete but are happy use the trauma that others have to live through as fodder for fear mongering. 
Both sides across all 3 branches are to blame, some more than others but all of them failed women.
